00005 enum SSYVersionTripletComparisonResult  {
00006         SSYDescendingMajor = -4,
00007         SSYDescendingMinor = -3,
00008         SSYDescendingBugFix = -2,
00009         SSYDescending = -1,  // unspecified if bugFix, minor or major
00010         SSYEqual = 0,
00011         SSYAscending = 1,  // unspecified if bugFix, minor or major
00012         SSYAscendingBugFix = 2,
00013         SSYAscendingMinor = 3,
00014         SSYAscendingMajor = 4,
00015 } ;
